name: maw-volunteer-hub
description: Volunteer Hub for Make-A-Wish San Diego
author: Triton Software Engineering <tse@ucsd.edu>

scripts.install: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.lint-fix: (npm run lint-fix --prefix backend || true) && npm run lint-fix --prefix frontend
scripts.lint-check: npm run lint-check --prefix backend && npm run lint-check --prefix frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && rm -rf backend/public && mv frontend/build backend/public
